projects.title: Reclaimed Oak Coffee Table
projects.description: Built from reclaimed oak floorboards, hand-finished with Danish oil. The grain on these boards was too good to hide.

projects.title: Little Wooden House Set
projects.description: A set of decorative wooden houses in mixed hardwoods. Each one is unique, shaped and sanded by hand.

projects.title: Walnut Desk Lamp
projects.description: A simple desk lamp carved from a single piece of walnut. Wired with a warm LED filament bulb.

projects.title: Cherry Keepsake Box
projects.description: A dovetailed keepsake box in cherry with a cedar-lined interior. Finished with shellac.

projects.title: Victorian Chair Restoration
projects.description: Stripped, repaired and re-upholstered a Victorian nursing chair. New joints, original character.

projects.title: Floating Shelves in Ash
projects.description: A pair of floating shelves from locally sourced ash. Hidden French cleat mounting.
